channel.title: Admin panel
channel.description:
Ok i have a idea for my server the admin panel, [s]I dont know how i need to say it but i will explain my idea[/s]
Ok i created the admin panel interface, Ok i want to have that if i have clicked on Ban user, a text bar open and if i typ there in the name the user will disconnect and get banned in the banlist.txt
I expect this is in clickingmost.java

item.title: Admin panel
item.dc:creator: @C4ll3r C4ll3r
item.description:
@C4ll3r wrote:

Ty i will use this for sure!

Read full topic

item.title: Admin panel
item.dc:creator: @primadude Primadude
item.description:
@primadude wrote:

Use something like:

banPlayer(JOptionPane.showInputDialog(this, "Enter the name of the player you wish to ban", "Ban name", 3));

The showInputDialog method will return the String that you typed into the dialogue box.

Read full topic
